page.title: 16SPORTS IN LIGHTCLIFFE
page.content: {THE CRICKET CLUB The field is about 2 acres.It is old but it has got some fire facilities. There has not been a fire yet!! They've got one international player called MAHBOOB, who played for{ PAKISTAN in the world cup of 1983. {THE OLD BRODLEANS The Old Brodleans started from the old boys of Hipperholme Grammar school. It is a very good rugby club.It gets very tense before a match but if they win they celebrate afterwards. They play for charity and friendly matches but mostly they play in a League,which they lead at the moment. {LIGHTCLIFFE GOLF CLUB There is an attractive nine hole golf course on Knowle Top Road.The club has a pooltable,pros shop a bar and a sunroom.The pro sells all you need to play.Also they sell meals at the bar.
